analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/24/0x04c271ef0e8dd18a24c194ae7e72d74398b3b4b0.sol#139-142) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/24/0x04c271ef0e8dd18a24c194ae7e72d74398b3b4b0.sol#155-160)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/24/0x04c271ef0e8dd18a24c194ae7e72d74398b3b4b0.sol#169-173)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/24/0x04c271ef0e8dd18a24c194ae7e72d74398b3b4b0.sol#181-185)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/24/0x04c271ef0e8dd18a24c194ae7e72d74398b3b4b0.sol#193-199)

CryptoHeroRocket.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0x04c271ef0e8dd18a24c194ae7e72d74398b3b4b0.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/24/0x04c271ef0e8dd18a24c194ae7e72d74398b3b4b0.sol)

CryptoHeroRocket.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0x04c271ef0e8dd18a24c194ae7e72d74398b3b4b0.sol#361)
